summary: A comfortable, unobtrusive player home for optional use with Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions by TMPhoenix.
descriptionHtml:
Player home located just south of Ivarstead. Comfortable and spacious with no scripting and minimal changes to texturing and existing items in game. Adds retextured beds for up to 6 children and spouse adoptable with TMPhoenix's mod Hearthfire Mulitple Adoptions http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29249
Contains 3 NPC characters, a merchant blacksmith, a merchant potions/general goods marriageable female, and a marriageable male follower who may be slightly overpowered if you add this mod at a low level. You already own the home, just move you and your family right in.

Required:
Dawngaurd
Hearthfire
Dragonborn
Update 1.9

Many thanks to TMPhoenix for the excellent help for modders in creating custom homes for Multiple Adoptions. Link attached for Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29249

V4 update, fixed all weapon racks/plaques corrected lighting issues and added many more storage areas to the home. Enjoy!!
author: DragonFang71
